List of inactive [[Promotional Code]]s realased during the current year.

Promotional codes from Genshin Impact [[Special Program]]s, also colloquially known as "livestreams", expire within 16 hours from its broadcast. Starting from Version 5.3, the redemption validity period for the Special Program codes will be extended by 48 hours.

The expiry dates for other non-event promotional codes are estimated.
